<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Crystalline Dust](/Feats.aspx?ID=2480) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Aphorite" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=335" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 76 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per day

</column>

---

You've learned to disperse the crystalline motes coating your body as a haze. You become [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4), though you can't use this concealment to [Hide](/Actions.aspx?ID=62) or [Sneak](/Actions.aspx?ID=63), as normal for concealment where your position is still obvious. The motes stay within an inch of your skin, move with you, and last for a number of rounds equal to half your level.

<title level="2">Crystalline Dust leads to...</title>
[Ancillary Motes](/Feats.aspx?ID=2484), [Crystalline Cloud](/Feats.aspx?ID=2485)
name: Crystalline Dust
